subject: Hockey, Ice
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The twins Henrik and Daniel Sedin had a hand in three first-period goals, and Roberto Luongo made 27 saves as the Vancouver Canucks beat the Devils, 5-2, in Newark.
snippet: The twins Henrik and Daniel Sedin had a hand in three first-period goals, and Roberto Luongo made 27 saves as the Vancouver Canucks beat the Devils, 5-2, in Newark.
